modShortDescription: This is the first mod pack in my series to expand the armor and clothing selection in game. I want to make every playthrough and experience different for each player.
modDescription:
This is the first mod pack in my series to expand the [armor](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-armor-mods/) and [clothing](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-clothing/) selection in game.

I think itâ€™s ridiculous that every player is forced to look basically the same. I want to make every playthrough and experience different for each player.

**New armor pieces are:**

* Crusader Helmet / Curiass
* Beserker Helmet / Curiass
* Paladin Helmet / Curiass
* Horned Helmet
* Open Faced Silver Helmet
* Elvish Helmet

I am still working on adding more pieces from this armor bundle so stay tuned.

ALL ASSETS WERE PURCHASED AND LICENSED TO SMITTYLV.

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1HDITwjLSAncwKGxh2JHEPKvubKpeAt94/view?usp=sharing)**

**Credits:** [smittylv](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/smittylv/)
